source: Patient with signs and symptoms of anaphylaxis
leaf: Administer IV fluids and reevaluate in 5-10 minutes
paths: Assess history and vital signs, excluding other causes -> Assess airway, breathing, circulation, and mentation. Place patient in Trendelenburg position and give O2. -> Establish airway -> Administer epinephrine -> Administer IV fluids and reevaluate in 5-10 minutes

source: Patient with signs and symptoms of anaphylaxis
paths: Assess history and vital signs, excluding other causes -> Bronchospasm -> observe for 24 hr -> Counsel patient to prevent future episodes -> Consider providing anaphylaxis kit -> Consider desensitization||Assess history and vital signs, excluding other causes -> Arrhythmia -> Correct hypoxemia, hypotension -> Usual Antiarrhythmic Therapy -> observe for 24 hr -> Counsel patient to prevent future episodes -> Consider providing anaphylaxis kit -> Consider desensitization

source: Patient with signs and symptoms of anaphylaxis
paths: Assess history and vital signs, excluding other causes -> Bronchospasm -> observe for 24 hr -> Counsel patient to prevent future episodes -> Consider providing anaphylaxis kit -> Consider prophylactic therapy||Assess history and vital signs, excluding other causes -> Arrhythmia -> Correct hypoxemia, hypotension -> Usual Antiarrhythmic Therapy -> observe for 24 hr -> Counsel patient to prevent future episodes -> Consider providing anaphylaxis kit -> Consider prophylactic therapy
